name: Microsoft Graph Security Tool
semantic_context: Consume the Microsoft Graph Security API
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Graph Security Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Microsoft Graph Security API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Consume the Microsoft Graph Security API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Microsoft Graph Security API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: secureScore

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

secureScoreId.name: secureScoreId
secureScoreId.description: ID of the secure score to retrieve
secureScoreId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Secure Score ID | 作用: ID of the secure score to retrieve | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: filter (值: None) - Query parameter to filter results by

secureScoreControlProfileId.name: secureScoreControlProfileId
secureScoreControlProfileId.description: ID of the secure score control profile to update
secureScoreControlProfileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Secure Score Control Profile ID | 作用: ID of the secure score control profile to update | (必填项)

provider.name: provider
provider.description: Name of the provider of the security product or service
provider.natural_language_description: 参数名: Provider | 作用: Name of the provider of the security product or service | (必填项)

vendor.name: vendor
vendor.description: Name of the vendor of the security product or service
vendor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Vendor | 作用: Name of the vendor of the security product or service | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: state (值: None) - Analyst driven setting on the control
